author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The failed tests in #26811 revealed that in case a module uses `refToPSet_` to point to a global `PSet` that is not found from the `Process`, the exception message comes from the `getattr()` and is not very helpful. This PR improves the exception message by including the offending module label and the referenced-to PSet label.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.
title: Improve exception message in customiseEarlyDelete
